name: node-pocketsphinx
description: Node binding for continuous voice recoginition through pocketsphinx.
author: Alpha Cephei Inc.

scripts.install: msbuild deps/sphinxbase/sphinxbase.sln /property:Platform=x64 /p:Configuration=Release -t:rebuild & msbuild deps/pocketsphinx/pocketsphinx.sln /property:Platform=x64 /p:Configuration=Release -t:rebuild & cmake-js -G "Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64 compile
